body:
Evangelos Christakou wrote:


If you've installed the Debian package - genbox was renamed there
exactly because of this problem. If you've build radiance from source,
make sure the path to genbox is included in $PATH.

--
Bernd Zeimetz
<bernd@bzed.de>                         <http://bzed.de/>
subject: [Radiance-general] genbox problem - Ubuntu 7.10
